title: One member from each family will get Rs 25,000 under the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana? No, this is fake | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A message is being circulated online with a claim that according to the new budget of 2020, one member from each family will get Rs 25,000 under the Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana.

The message was circulated with a link to a website.

NewsMobile fact-checked the above post and the above post to be fake.

Firstly we checked the link present with the message and found it to be FAKE. The official website of Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana is this.

Moreover, we also found a post by PIB stating that the news is fake and so is the website link present with the message.

PIB also warned users against the fake website stating that it is a non-government website that only collects that which can be misused in the future.

The above information proves that the viral message is fake.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
